lead_paragraph: The Indy Japan 300 in Motegi, Japan, was rescheduled to Sunday because of a wet track. The season points leader, Hélio Castroneves, will have the pole position.
snippet: The Indy Japan 300 in Motegi, Japan, was rescheduled to Sunday because of a wet track. The season points leader, Hélio Castroneves, will have the pole position.
